description: This Python script demonstrates how to extend caching duration for agents using Anthropic models, including downloading a system prompt, configuring an agent with extended cache time, and executing sample API calls to illustrate caching behavior.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with models, capable of executing prompts and managing cache.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Represents the Anthropic Claude model with specific configurations.

methods.name: download_file
methods.description: Downloads a file from a URL to a specified local path.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes a prompt using the agent, returning a response object with metrics.
